TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DirectoryServicesPermission extends System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase

Docs.summary: The DirectoryServicesPermission class allows you to control code access security permissions for <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry[] permissionAccessEntries) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntry"> objects. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission.PermissionEntries%2A> property is set to this value.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission"> class with the specified permission access level entries.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission"> class with the specified permission state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess permissionAccess, string path) cil managed

Docs.param: The path of the Active Directory Domain Services object, otherwise known as the ADsPath, to which the permissions apply.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission"> class with the specified access levels and specified path to an Active Directory Domain Services node.
Gets the collection of permission entries for this permission.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionEntryCollection"> object that contains the permission entries for this permission.
